Title: The guardian of the ice
Writer: Salvatore Metastasio, Giulia Morgani, Giulia Morgani (story)
Actors: Pietro De Silva, Pietro Faiella, Paolo Perinelli, Giulia Morgani
Plot: In a house, on the top of a snowy mountain, the driver of a cable car (Claus Lein) hides a woman with mental disorders, Cloris, at his home. The situation is deteriorating their lives ...
